# LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI understand and interact with the Taypro website

# Website Information
# Site Name: Taypro
# Primary Keyword: Solar Panel Cleaning Robot
# Description: Taypro is an innovative company specializing in autonomous Solar Panel Cleaning Robots and systems for solar farms in India. We manufacture the best automatic and semi-automatic solar panel cleaning robots with highest uptime guarantee.
# Technology Stack: Next.js 15.5.4, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
# Base URL: https://taypro.in (or your deployment domain)

# About Taypro - Solar Panel Cleaning Robot Manufacturer
Taypro develops and manufactures autonomous Solar Panel Cleaning Robots that help solar farms maintain optimal efficiency. 
Our Solar Panel Cleaning Robot systems offer waterless cleaning solutions, dual-pass cleaning technology, and AI-powered scheduling systems.
Taypro has won patents for our revolutionary Solar Panel Cleaning Robot system.

# Primary Product: Solar Panel Cleaning Robot
The Solar Panel Cleaning Robot is Taypro's flagship product designed to autonomously clean solar panels at utility-scale solar farms.
Key benefits of our Solar Panel Cleaning Robot:
- Increases solar panel efficiency up to 30%
- Waterless cleaning technology (saves millions of liters of water)
- AI-powered scheduling for optimal cleaning cycles
- Highest uptime guarantee in the industry
- Autonomous operation with minimal human intervention
- Dual-pass cleaning system (air blast + microfiber)
- Suitable for fixed-tilt and single-axis tracker solar panel systems

# Main Pages and Routes

## Homepage
/ - Landing page with company overview, services, and call-to-action sections

## Company Information
/company - About Taypro, team members, mission, and vision

## Products & Services - Solar Panel Cleaning Robot Models
/solar-panel-cleaning-system - Overview of Solar Panel Cleaning Robot systems and models
/solar-panel-cleaning-system/automatic-solar-panel-cleaning-system - Automatic Solar Panel Cleaning Robot (Model-A): Fully autonomous AI-enabled robot
/solar-panel-cleaning-system/semi-automatic-solar-panel-cleaning-system - Semi-Automatic Solar Panel Cleaning Robot (Model-B): Cost-effective solution
/solar-panel-cleaning-system/automatic-solar-panel-cleaning-system-for-single-axis-trackers - Single-Axis Tracker Solar Panel Cleaning Robot (Model-T): For tracking systems
/solar-panel-cleaning-system/solar-panel-cleaning-service - Solar Panel Cleaning Robot service and maintenance offerings
/solar-panel-cleaning-system/automatic-cleaning-robot-monitoring-app - Taypro Console: Monitoring app for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot fleet

## Technology
/cleaning-technology - Technical details about cleaning technology

## Projects
/projects - Showcase of solar farm projects
/projects/automatic - Automatic installation projects
/projects/semi-automatic - Semi-automatic installation projects
/projects/capex - CAPEX model projects

## Tools & Calculators
/solar-panel-cleaning-robot-price-calculator - ROI calculator for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot investment and cost savings

## Blog
/blog - Blog listing page with all articles
/blog/[slug] - Individual blog post pages (dynamic routing)
/blog/add - Blog creation interface (authenticated)
/blog/db/[id] - Database-stored blog posts (dynamic routing)

Blog topics include:
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot technology and innovations
- Solar panel cleaning methods and best practices
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot installation and ROI calculations
- Solar energy efficiency and maintenance
- Robotic cleaning systems for solar farms
- Automatic vs manual solar panel cleaning
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot benefits and features
- Industry news and innovations in solar cleaning robotics
- Technical comparisons of Solar Panel Cleaning Robot models
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot cost-benefit analysis

# API Endpoints

## Public APIs

### Blog APIs
GET /api/blog/list
- Returns: List of all blog posts (from both file system and database)
- Response: { blogs: Array<{title, description, featuredImage, author, slug, publishDate, href, source}> }
- Content-Type: application/json

GET /api/blog/slug/[slug]
- Returns: Single blog post by slug
- Response: Blog post data with content

POST /api/blog/create
- Creates a new blog post in the database
- Body: { title, description, featuredImage, author, content }
- Requires: All fields except author (defaults to "Taypro Team")
- Response: { success: boolean, id, slug, url }

### Other APIs
GET /api/blog/scrape
- Scrapes blog content from external URLs (WordPress sites)
- Query params: url (required)

## Admin APIs (Require Authentication)

POST /api/admin/auth/login
- Authenticates admin user
- Body: { password }
- Response: { success: boolean }

GET /api/admin/blog/list
- Returns: List of all blog posts from file system
- Requires: Authentication cookie

POST /api/admin/blog/create
- Creates a new blog post as file
- Body: { title, description, featuredImage, author, content, publishDate }
- Requires: Authentication

GET /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Gets blog post metadata by slug
- Requires: Authentication

PUT /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Updates blog post by slug
- Requires: Authentication

DELETE /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Deletes blog post by slug
- Requires: Authentication

GET /api/admin/upload/list
- Lists uploaded images from public/uploads directory
- Requires: Authentication

POST /api/admin/upload
- Uploads images to public/uploads directory
- Body: FormData with image file
- Requires: Authentication

# Content Structure

## Blog Posts
Blog posts are stored in two ways:
1. File-based: Located in src/app/blog/[slug]/ with metadata.json and page.tsx
2. Database: Stored in backend database, accessible via API

Each blog post contains:
- title: Blog post title
- description: Meta description
- featuredImage: URL to featured image
- author: Author name (default: "Taypro Team")
- slug: URL-friendly identifier
- publishDate: ISO date string
- content: HTML content of the blog post

## Images
Public images are stored in:
- /public/blogs/ - Blog post images
- /public/tayproasset/ - Company assets and logos
- /public/tayprorobots/ - Robot product images
- /public/tayprosolarfirm/ - Solar farm project images
- /public/tayprokeymetrics/ - Project metrics images
- /public/uploads/ - User uploaded images (requires auth)

## External Image Sources
The site also uses images from:
- https://taypro.in/wp-content/uploads/ - WordPress site images
- https://res.cloudinary.com - Cloudinary CDN
- https://images.unsplash.com - Unsplash images

# Data Sources

## Backend API
- Base URL: https://console.taypro.in (configurable via NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL)
- Blog Posts: GET /api/v1/blogposts
- Blog by Slug: GET /api/v1/blogposts/slug/[slug]
- Blog by ID: GET /api/v1/blogposts/id/[id]
- Create Blog: POST /api/v1/blogposts

## Content Format
- Blog content is stored as HTML
- Images in blog content use standard <img> tags
- Featured images use Next.js Image component with optimization

# Key Features - Solar Panel Cleaning Robot

## Solar Panel Cleaning Robot Models
- Model A (Automatic Solar Panel Cleaning Robot): Fully autonomous with AI-enabled scheduling
- Model B (Semi-Automatic Solar Panel Cleaning Robot): Cost-effective semi-autonomous solution
- Model T (Single-Axis Tracker Solar Panel Cleaning Robot): Designed for tracking solar panel systems

## Solar Panel Cleaning Robot Technology
- Waterless cleaning technology: Our Solar Panel Cleaning Robot uses zero water, saving millions of liters
- Dual-pass cleaning system: Air blast + microfiber for 100% dust removal
- AI-powered scheduling: Intelligent cleaning cycles based on weather and dust prediction
- Real-time monitoring: Taypro Console mobile app for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot fleet management
- Highest uptime guarantee: Industry-leading reliability for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot systems
- Suitable for fixed-tilt and single-axis tracker solar panel systems
- Increases solar panel efficiency by up to 30%
- Autonomous operation with minimal maintenance

## Services - Solar Panel Cleaning Robot Support
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot installation and deployment
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot maintenance and support services
- ROI and performance analysis for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot investments
- Custom Solar Panel Cleaning Robot solutions for different solar farm configurations
- Solar Panel Cleaning Robot training and operational support
- 24/7 monitoring and support for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot fleet

# SEO and Metadata - Optimized for "Solar Panel Cleaning Robot"
- All pages include proper metadata with "Solar Panel Cleaning Robot" keyword focus
- Blog posts have structured metadata optimized for Solar Panel Cleaning Robot searches
- Schema.org structured data for Organization, Product (Solar Panel Cleaning Robot), and Article markup
- Sitemap available at /sitemap.xml with all Solar Panel Cleaning Robot pages
- Robots.txt at /robots.txt properly configured
- Open Graph and Twitter card metadata for social sharing
- Canonical URLs for all pages

# Technical Details

## Development
- Framework: Next.js 15.5.4 with App Router
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4.1
- Image Optimization: Next.js Image component
- Content Editor: TipTap (Rich text editor)

## Build & Deployment
- Development: `npm run dev` (uses Turbopack)
- Build: `npm run build`
- Start: `npm start`
- Sitemap: Auto-generated with next-sitemap

# How to Interact with This Site

## For Content Discovery
1. Start at /blog for all blog posts
2. Use /api/blog/list for programmatic access to blog listings
3. Individual blog posts available at /blog/[slug]
4. Projects showcase at /projects

## For Content Creation
1. Authenticate via /api/admin/auth/login
2. Use /api/admin/blog/create for file-based blogs
3. Use /api/blog/create for database-stored blogs
4. Upload images via /api/admin/upload

## For Data Analysis
1. Blog metadata available via /api/blog/list
2. Each blog includes: title, description, publishDate, author, slug
3. Content is HTML-formatted and includes images
4. Blog posts cover solar energy, cleaning technology, and industry trends

# Important Notes

- The site uses Next.js Image optimization for better performance
- External images from taypro.in may require proper CORS headers
- Blog content may contain embedded images from external sources
- Authentication is required for admin operations
- The site integrates with a backend API at console.taypro.in

# Contact Information
For questions about Taypro products and services, visit the website or use the contact forms available on various pages.
